title: BIR Form 1913 — Application for Refund of Excess Withholding Tax (DTC)

sections.title: Part I – Details of the Person Claiming Refund

fields.label: 1. Registered Name
fields.summary: For individual: Last, First, Middle, Suffix. For non-individual: registered name.

fields.label: 5. Country of Residence/Taxation
fields.summary: Write country where you are taxable as resident.

sections.title: Part II – Details of Withholding Agent/Income Payor

fields.label: 8. Registered Name
fields.summary: For individual: Last, First, Middle, Suffix. For non-individual: registered name.

fields.label: 12. Related Party?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No if income payor is related to claimant.

fields.label: 12A. If Yes, describe relationship
fields.summary: If related, explain relationship (e.g., parent company, subsidiary).

sections.title: Part III – Details of Claim for Refund

fields.label: 15. Kind of Income
fields.summary: Describe income (e.g., dividends, royalties, service fees).

fields.label: Amount of Income
fields.summary: Write total amount of income received.

fields.label: Date of Payment of Withholding Tax
Tax Amount to be Withheld Under Treaty
fields.summary: Write tax due based on treaty rate.

fields.label: Amount to be Refunded
fields.summary: Compute refund = Tax withheld – Treaty tax amount.

fields.label: 16. Relevant Tax Treaty
fields.summary: Write name of treaty (e.g., Philippines–Japan Tax Treaty).

fields.label: 18. Tax Treatment
fields.summary: Tick: Exempt from Income Tax OR Subject to Preferential Rate.

sections.title: Part V – Authorized Representative in the Philippines

fields.label: 19. Registered Name
fields.summary: Write full name (individual or registered entity).

fields.label: Signature of Claimant/Authorized Representative
fields.summary: Sign over printed name to certify correctness and consent to Data Privacy Act.

fields.label: Tax Agent Accreditation/Attorney’s Roll No.
fields.summary: If applicable, write accreditation or roll number.
